top-page.title: Want Better Tenants? Start with Better Listings
top-page.desc: The first part of Rentorr's property management software walks you through listing creation so you can be sure you've included all of the details that high quality tenants care about.

paragraf-one.title: More Than Just Tools for Landlords, We're also A Listing Service

text.desc:
Rentorr utilizes a partner network to make our property management services useful before
your properties are even filled. Posting your listing across a wide range of services ensure more
potential tenants become interested in renting your property.

apply.title: Listings Include Integrated Applications
apply.text:
Sick of sifting through rental applications for tenants who aren't qualified? We understand, and
that's why our integrated service can help you see the best possible applicants faster when you
allow them to apply directly from your listing.

item.title: Featured Rentals
item.text: Want to be absolutely certain your property rentals are getting the attention they deserve? Feature your listing so it appears front and center.

item.title: Verified Status
item.text: Like many social media platforms, Rentorr highlights your listing's features with a special ribbon badge that appears on the search page for listings.

item.title: Easy Correspondence
item.text: Rentorr allows you to receive messages from applicants with a time stamp, and to apply directly through the app or through your own email.

ready.title: Ready to Get Started?
ready.desc: Get the kinds of qualified applicants your property deserves when you created a specialized listing with Rentorr.
